keyPolicies.policyDescription: Extend the free early education offer for three and four-year-olds from 15 to 25 hours per week for working parents. Also ensure all under-fives have access to a Sure Start Children's Center.
Guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer test results within one week.
Supporting building of thousands of homes a year to buy and rent.

issues.health: Bill Edwards wants to guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer test results within one week.

housing.content: Supporting building of thousands of homes a year to buy and rent.

politicalExperience.achievements: During his time, he worked closely with the local community to protect frontline services and fight for every resident.

contactInformation.address: 39 St Andrews Street North, Bury St Edmunds, IP33 1TH
